select sum(p.money) from pay_details p left join tb_user u on u.user_id=p.user_id where p.`state`=1
and date_format(p.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(p.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m')
and date_format(p.create_time,'%Y')=date_format(#{date},'%Y')
and u.qd_code=#{qdCode}

select * from ( select c.course_id as courseId,sum(o.pay_money) as 'coursemoney' ,count(*) as 'coursenum',any_value(c.title) as 'coursename' from orders o left join course c on o.course_id=c.course_id where o.status=1 and o.orders_type=1
and sys_user_id=#{sysUserId}
and date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(o.create_time,'%Y-%m')=date_format(#{date},'%Y-%m')
and date_format(o.create_time,'%Y')=date_format(#{date},'%Y')
group by c.course_id ) a order by a.coursenum desc

select *,(select count(*) from tb_user u1 where u1.inviter_code=u.invitation_code) as counts, (select ifnull(sum(money),0.00) from invite i where i.user_id=u.user_id) as money from tb_user u where 1=1
and user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
order by money desc,counts desc

select * from tb_user where is_channel=1 and status=1 and recommend_user_id=#{userId}
and user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
order by create_time desc

select u.*,(select ifnull(sum(money),0.00) from pay_details p where p.user_id=u.user_id and p.state=1) as money from tb_user u where u.status=1 and u.inviter_code=#{invitationCode}
and u.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and u.phone like concat('%',#{phone},'%')
order by u.create_time desc
